bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to James M. Barnett, January 28, 1942

div1.p: Hench thanks Barnett for the articles on malaria control.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to James M. Barnett, January 28, 1942
div1.opener:
y f.
January 28, 1942
Dr. James M. Barnett
Albany, Georgia
My dear Doctor Barnett:
div1.p:
Thank you very kindly indeed for sending me
your articles on malarial control. They are very inter-
esting indeed.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
